comment.author: 37002282@N00
comment._content: I think this is quite a historically significant photo, in that a "car" is being transported by a Horse and Cart!

comment.author: 82887550@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Transport In The Frame, and we'd love to have this added to the group! What a wonderful bit of history

comment._content: beachcomberaustralia - I think it could be at Woolloomoolloo. the number style is similar, but it could also be at Walsh Bay. www.flickr.com/photos/lolainsydney/2810074327/ Field trip required for confirmation.
